    • setSignUpDate

      public void setSignUpDate(Calendar signUpDate)
      This function sets the sign-up date for a user account using a Calendar object.
      Parameters:
      signUpDate - a variable of type Calendar that represents the date when a user signed up for a service or application. The method setSignUpDate() is a setter method that sets the value of the signUpDate variable to the value passed as a parameter.
